siteMetadata.title: Maggie Appleton
siteMetadata.description: Maggie Appleton is an art director and anthropological designer. This is her digital garden for growing visual explanations about technology, culture, and programming

childMdx.excerpt: Illustrated notes I made while working through  Chris Achard 's  Fix Common Git Mistakes  course on egghead. Want more illustrated notes on web development? Take a look at  Building Custom React Hooksâ€¦

inboundReferenceNotes.title: What the Fork is React Suspense?

childMdx.excerpt: Suspense is  an upcoming React feature  that's part of the new "concurrent mode." Since everyone is getting all hyped up about it, I wanted to figure out what the excitement was and drew some quickâ€¦

I've made plenty of illustrated notes for  egghead  courses. On everything from  Building Custom React Hooks  to  Fixing Common Git Mistakes  to  The Basics of Rust They've always been artefacts madeâ€¦

Last year the  React  team released a feature called "hooks" that lets you do some powerful stuff we couldn't do as easily before... Managing state. Accessing DOM elements. Using side effects. It's fair to say the React community had a collective melt-down over this. For theâ€¦

outboundReferenceNotes.title: JavaScript Bits You Skipped the First Time Around

childMdx.excerpt: Being humans, we rarely learn things linearly. No one begins their JavaScript journey by reading  the TC39 language specification  line-by-line like a pedantic masochist. Instead we all cobble together a good-enough understanding, leaving holes here and there to fill in later. Soâ€¦
